cobblemon.species.pumett.name: Pumett
cobblemon.species.pumett.desc1: It sleeps on the branches of dying trees, revitalizing them.
cobblemon.species.volparin.name: Volparin
cobblemon.species.volparin.desc1: Its elegant movements can release healing waves around it.
cobblemon.species.jourenard.name: Jourenard
cobblemon.species.jourenard.desc1: Its foolish demeanor transmits healing waves, the berries it uses are charged with damaging waves.
cobblemon.species.flamble.name: Flamble
cobblemon.species.flamble.desc1: It observes anyone with its penetrating eyes, no one has ever seen it close its eyes.
cobblemon.species.sleeblaze.name: Sleeblaze
cobblemon.species.sleeblaze.desc1: It has a very sad demeanor, the flames of its body aren't dangerous but cause sleep and hallucinations.
cobblemon.species.ferndred.name: Ferndred
cobblemon.species.ferndred.desc1: It can make people sleep and manipulate their dreams, it has an unusual fear for musharna.
cobblemon.species.dolwashi.name: Dolwashi
cobblemon.species.dolwashi.desc1: It has a tail that it can rotate which allows it to swim at high speed.
cobblemon.species.walphin.name: Walphin
cobblemon.species.walphin.desc1: It's very lively and loves to steal small objects from bathers.
cobblemon.species.zorocean.name: Zorocean
cobblemon.species.zorocean.desc1: It has fins that are so sharp that it can cut a boulder in half.
cobblemon.species.sounoir.name: Sounoir
cobblemon.species.sounoir.desc1: It can be found in flocks with a ballearia. It never stops chirp.
cobblemon.species.sonayre.name: Sonayre
cobblemon.species.sonayre.desc1: It's part of a group of sounoirs as contralto or as mezzo-soprano.
cobblemon.species.ballearia.name: Ballearia
cobblemon.species.ballearia.desc1: Males teach to sounoirs how to sing, females are excellent singers. Rumors say that they can learn some human language.
cobblemon.species.hissilly.name: Hissilly
cobblemon.species.hissilly.desc1: Its poison is toxic to everyone except corals and corsola.
cobblemon.species.hissicobra.name: Hissicobra
cobblemon.species.hissicobra.desc1: They love to care of a corsola, they can heal their injuries with their healing poison.
cobblemon.species.coracondra.name: Coracondra
cobblemon.species.coracondra.desc1: The coral on its body is a perfect home for tiny pokemon such corsola and hissilly. The poison produced can revive dead corsola.
cobblemon.species.silwaddle.name: Silwaddle
cobblemon.species.silwaddle.desc1: Despite it resembles Sewaddle, it was recently discovered that it is actually not a caterpillar but a spider.
cobblemon.species.silkloon.name: Silkloon
cobblemon.species.dilkloon.desc1: It hides its body under a silk cloak while is sewing its new dress.
cobblemon.species.weavanny.name: Weavanny
cobblemon.species.weavanny.desc1: It loves to weave, the cobweb produced has unique properties, delicate as silk but strong as iron.
cobblemon.species.katmir.name: Katmir
cobblemon.species.katmir.desc1: It walks for miles in hostile zone without suffer from hungry or thirst.
cobblemon.species.meerogue.name: Meerogue
cobblemon.species.meerogue.desc1: It has found a divining rod but it prefers to use it as a club. It will evolve when it learns how to use it.
cobblemon.species.surisham.name: Surisham
cobblemon.species.surisham.desc1: Thanks to its magic stick it can control water under the desert zones, creating oasis to live with its cubs.
cobblemon.species.shinx_alatian.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.shinx_alatian.desc1: It can manipulate light rays with the lens on its tail, creating mirages.
cobblemon.species.luxio_alatian.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.luxio_alatian.desc1: The blue bands can absorb sunrays, transform it into vital energy.
cobblemon.species.luxray_alatian.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.luxray_alatian.desc1: Rumors say that a single luxray, once it has found a perfect place, can create a sand castle as its home.
cobblemon.species.yamask_alatian.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.yamask_alatian.desc1: Rumors say that it's the soul of a child torn from its body and imprisoned in a bottle. When it's afraid it pretends to be a bottle filled with a black liquid.
cobblemon.species.ampularigus.name: Ampularigus
cobblemon.species.ampularigus.desc1: It pretends to be a vase. The body is made of sand which acts like a liquid.
cobblemon.species.drillorm.name: Drillorm
cobblemon.species.drillorm.desc1: It lives in groups of hundreds of drillorm following a worvator for food.
cobblemon.species.worvator.name: Worvator
cobblemon.species.worvator.desc1: When it moves underground, it generates tremors that can move sand dunes.
cobblemon.species.glameow_alatian.name: Glameow
cobblemon.species.glameow_alatian.desc1: She continuously cleans her white fur, if anyone dares to touch it it will pay the consequences.
cobblemon.species.purlady.name: Purlady
cobblemon.species.purlady.desc1: She loves compliments, when she gets angry her fur gets very hot. She hates the rude behavior of purugly.
cobblemon.species.sableye_alatian.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.sableye_alatian.desc1: Due to low mineral presence in Alatia's caves, it's adapted to eat metal ores and such, that's why it causes continuous issues in the underground Alatia's railway system.
cobblemon.species.ferrosleyer.name: Ferrosleyer
cobblemon.species.ferrosleyer.desc1: The great amount of metals eaten has made it monstrous, developing only the upper part of the body and a tail that can cut a 10cm thick steel bar.
cobblemon.species.sympheon.name: Sympheon
cobblemon.species.sympheon.desc1: The lines in its ears, which resemble strings, change shape according to the melody it hears. If the melody is horrible the lines will take a very confusing shape, if it's good they cange into sine waves.
cobblemon.species.prismeon.name: Prismeon
cobblemon.species.prismeon.desc1: The eyes reflects a part of the universe never observed before, the color of the fur can make visible the cosmic microwave background.
cobblemon.species.glideon.name: Glideon
cobblemon.species.glideon.desc1: It cannot fly without being carried by an air current, it can go into the clouds and change the weather conditions thanks to its breath.
cobblemon.species.blitzumi.name: Blitzumi
cobblemon.species.blitzumi.desc1: It suffers from headaches, when it calm down it passes into a tranquility state, using all of its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.rockarin.name: Rockarin
cobblemon.species.rockarin.desc1: Despite being made of rock, it's so light that it can float on air currents, producing a sinister sound.
cobblemon.species.berrock.name: Berrock
cobblemon.species.berrock.desc1: The pieces of rock that compose it are not fixed to each other, if it takes a supereffective hit it collapses and then recompose itself.
cobblemon.species.bibishock.name: Bibishock
cobblemon.species.bibishock.desc1: Its body works like a capacitor, when someone rubs it, it can acquire a huge amount of electric charges.
cobblemon.species.tikishock.name: Tikishock
cobblemon.species.tikishock.desc1: When its body is charged of electricity, it releases it in an instant by sprinting at high speed or throwing a powerful punch.
cobblemon.species.ursashock.name: Ursashock
cobblemon.species.ursashock.desc1: Its body can contain the same amount of charges as a lightning bolt. They are also used as emergency power supply.
cobblemon.species.boomka.name: Boomka
cobblemon.species.boomka.desc1: It has a grumpy behavior, when it gets angry it starts to make explosions without taking damage.
cobblemon.species.burstile.name: Burstile
cobblemon.species.burstile.desc1: Its mane of sparks can generate explosive charges that can be thrown.
cobblemon.species.nitragon.name: Nitragon
cobblemon.species.nitragon.desc1: It's commonly used to demolish large buildings, although it doesn't have wings, it can use its blasts for propulsion.
cobblemon.species.tinchoir.name: Tinchoir
cobblemon.species.tinchoir.desc1: Despite its size, it's very heavy. It loves to swing by tying itself to a rope.
cobblemon.species.chortoise.name: Choirtoise
cobblemon.species.chortoise.desc1: It's very slow at walking but in the water it can swim at a speed of 100km/h.
cobblemon.species.turalyzer.name: Turalyzer
cobblemon.species.turalyzer.desc1: It's an excellet rescuer and it can tow a ship at the speed of 120km/h.
cobblemon.species.ebery.name: Ebery
cobblemon.species.ebery.desc1: On its body they grow purple flowers to camouflage in the bushes, they can also shoot an hallucinogenic liquid.
cobblemon.species.nagarel.name: Nagarel
cobblemon.species.nagarel.desc1: It has a flower on its tail which it uses to attract prey and spray it with its hallucinogenic venom.
cobblemon.species.spinaga.name: Spinaga
cobblemon.species.spinaga.desc1: Instead of hiding in bushes like its previous stages, it hides in thorn bushes which it uses as a home.
cobblemon.species.boxrin.name: Boxrin
cobblemon.species.boxrin.desc1: Itâ€™s constantly searching for the perfect fighting style. Because of its short arms, it wears mushrooms like boxing gloves to punch.
cobblemon.species.rinstomp.name: Rinstomp
cobblemon.species.rinstomp.desc1: Itâ€™s constantly searching for the perfect fighting style. Through evolution, it develops strong limbs that enable it to specialize in close combat. Its stomps can shake the earth.
cobblemon.species.gladiathorn.name: Gladiathorn
cobblemon.species.gladiathorn.desc1: Combining the martial arts learned at previous stages, it has finally found the perfect fighting style for it. It grows barbed vines from the head, which uses to create sturdy weapons.
cobblemon.species.frinx.name: Frinx
cobblemon.species.frinx.desc1: Most of them are very skittish in the presence of humans, prefering to spend their time alone or with others of the same species. Their eyesight is one of the best in the world, managing to spot danger from miles away, often looking from treetops.
cobblemon.species.avalinx.name: Avalinx
cobblemon.species.avalinx.desc1: Their paws are covered by hardened ice, this allows them to skate on most surfaces. They prefer to rest in treetops while survivailing the sorrounding area, making them a very rare species to spost in the wild.
cobblemon.species.ironstalker.name: Iron Stalker
cobblemon.species.froxic.name: Froxic
cobblemon.species.froxic.desc1: It continously produces a nitrogen-based liquid that freeze anything.
cobblemon.species.permafrox.name: Permafrox
cobblemon.species.permafrox.desc1: Its body secretes a nitrogen-based toxin that is dangerous more for its ability to freeze anything than for poisonousness.
cobblemon.species.snoddle.name: Snoddle
cobblemon.species.snoddle.desc1: Despite the similarities with dwebble, it's a different species and it's very aggressive due to the hostile habitat in which it lives.
cobblemon.species.icicranid.name: Icicranid
cobblemon.species.icicranid.desc1: The weight of its snowball allows it to generate avalanche at will.
cobblemon.species.bulbee.name: Bulbee
cobblemon.species.bulbee.desc1: It's part of a swarm that collaborates to manage the hive, uses its bioluminescence to communicate with others with specific signals.
cobblemon.species.glownet.name: Glownet
cobblemon.species.glownet_yellow.desc1: It has the task of transport food in the hive. Thanks to its glowing back it can communicate with others members with specific light signals.
cobblemon.species.glownet_red.desc1: It has the task of attack the intruders in the hive. Thanks to its glowing back it can communicate with others members with specific light signals.
cobblemon.species.glownet_green.desc1: It has the task of protect the hive from dangers. Thanks to its glowing back it can communicate with others members with specific light signals.
cobblemon.species.beaquin.name: Beaquin
cobblemon.species.beaquin.desc1: She rules all the hive. Thanks to her glowing back she can communicate with others members with specific light signals.
cobblemon.species.tequibat.name: Tequibat
cobblemon.species.tequibat.desc1: Its metabolism is unusual, it consumes the pigment contained in fruits and vegetables but not the food itself. When it's hungry it turn pale.
cobblemon.species.chiroquila.name: Chiroquila
cobblemon.species.chiroquila.desc1: The wings color changes in base of the last food it ate.
